ISSUE.TITLE: request help: what does `ctx.upstream_healthcheck_parent` do?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue description here: https://github.com/apache/apisix/blob/eb0bf87b3865b4192991f963594bc24b54d9aff9/apisix/upstream.lua#L78 It looks like storing this in the ctx isn't used now. ### Environment - apisix version (cmd: `apisix version`): - OS (cmd: `uname -a`): - OpenResty / Nginx version (cmd: `nginx -V` or `openresty -V`): - etcd version, if have (cmd: run `curl http://127.0.0.1:9090/v1/server_info` to get the info from server-info API): - apisix-dashboard version, if have: - the plugin runner version, if the issue is about a plugin runner (cmd: depended on the kind of runner): - luarocks version, if the issue is about installation (cmd: `luarocks --version`):

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: docs: refactor the docs associated with Logger (#6415)
